name: Component Documentation Migration Configuration
description: Configuration for migrating component MDX files to standardized API specification format

transformations.name: meta_component_update
transformations.description: Update Meta component to use API Specification format

transformations.name: h1_to_docheading
transformations.description: Replace H1 titles with DocHeading component

transformations.name: add_props_section
transformations.description: Add Props section above Controls component

transformations.name: api_to_examples
transformations.description: Change API section title to Examples

validation_rules: Meta component must use API Specification title format
DocHeading must be used instead of H1 titles
Props section must appear before Examples section
All subsections must be nested under Examples as H3
All Canvas and story references must be preserved
ResourceLinks and KAIOInstallation content must be maintained
